Changes.Message: General availability of Xtract Core. Contact Theobald Software sales at https://theobald-software.com/en/contact/ for more information.
Added JSON license file mechanism to ERPConnect
Fixed transport request for systems that do no have data element "c1" present.
Usage Analytics: Fixed a bug where running extractions would not be included in the next collection
Changes.ReleaseNote:
* unfinished runs will be considered for the next collection
* version number will always be the one of the installed product
* unattended setup will write config into the correct directory

Changes.Message: Fixed multiple issues when handling invalid or unknown config version.
